headline: Wendy’s Has a Plan to Reignite Growth. Investors Are on the Sidelines.
summary: Weight-management drugs, inflation pressure, and weaker consumer spending have led to sluggish sales at fast-food chains.

headline: Hershey: Cheaper Cocoa/Sugar Trigger Robust 2026 Margin Recovery Prospects

headline: From Nutella to Froot Loops: Inside Ferrero’s push to become America’s next packaged food giant
summary: Sales have surged to $3 billion in the U.S. through a blend of multi-billion-dollar acquisitions and innovations to its core brands.
